name: Boys & Girls at the Museum
description:
Boys & Girls, get ready for some crazy trip to the museum with your colleagues and class fellows to enjoy the history knowledge of your country and about some old animals infrastructure. You should visit the whole museum and gather some informative study about every object and just feel the reactions. Make it a adventure trip of your life with your friends and family. You can feel something can happen unexpectedly. There are lion, tigers and dinosaur skeletons to fix for your crazy knowledge. Get yourself ready for the old exhibit inside the museum. You can done some ancient paint work with many of your other members on this trip. Do some crazy science experiments. DressUp yourself in crazy shirts, pants, glasses and shoes.It will be really a memorable trip for you.


BOYS & GIRLS AT THE MUSEUM GAME FEATURE:

- Make your own sculpture in this crazy museum adventure trip
- High quality Museum game for Kids, girls and college teen girls & boys
- Easy to play with touch and control
- Fun for children of school children and teens girls
- Different gorgeous dresses to choose for girls and teens
- Dozens of dress accessories for High school girls and boys
- Lot of beautiful animals skeletons to combine for study
- Fun accessories to complete the makeover are ready for endless combinations
- Share your creations easily by Save in your images gallery
- Help your fellows to draw some classic painting of history

Let’s create your own mystery museum artifacts. Find some hidden amazing fun from this old museum. Let’s study the history of animals and just imagine your life with them. Put yourself into dreams and do some crazy science experiments inside the museum lab. Girls are very curious to reveal some hidden objects. Let’s find something which is not already discovered yet.

It is the free educational and training game for all age of people. Explore the history of some unavailable animals. Play with the animals which do not exist in this current age. It is the virtual adventure for school boys and teens. Let the fun never ends with wild animals.This museum game will give you the realistic experience of crazy adventure trip to museum with School fellows. You can show your fashion designers skills to your friends and family by drawing the skeletons and beautiful painting inside the museum paint class. It can be the best educational game. You can wait for our upcoming cooking, dress up,makeup and makeover games. Remember, It is the FREE Game to have some real Fun.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
